name: Soul Split (NOKIA 3310 JAM 2020)
description:
A game where death isn't the end, but a gateway. Split your soul from your mortal flesh to solve the puzzles! 

Touch the tombstone or levers to come back to life! Touch flags to set a checkpoint, and push blocks to... well, push them.

CONTROLS
=========================
AD/Left+Right to move
W/Up to jump
ESC to go back to menu
Enter to interact with the menu/leave end screen
